description: Enterprise techniques used by reGeorg, ATT&CK software S1187 (v1.0)
name: reGeorg (S1187)

techniques.comment: [reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) can use HTTP to tunnel connections in and out of targeted networks.(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)
[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) is a Python-based web shell.(Citation: GitHub reGeorg 2016)
[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) has the ability to download files to targeted systems.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) can tunnel TCP sessions into targeted networks.(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)

[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) can tunnel TCP sessions including RDP, SSH, and SMB through HTTP.(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)(Citation: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor)

[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) can establish an HTTP or SOCKS proxy to tunnel data in and out of a network.(Citation: GitHub reGeorg 2016)(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)
[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) can be used to tunnel RDP connections.(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)
[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) has the ability to tunnel SMB sessions.(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)
[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) can communicate using SSH through an HTTP tunnel.(Citation: Fortinet reGeorg MAR 2019)

[reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) is a web shell that has been installed on exposed web servers for access to victim environments.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)(Citation: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor)
